outline:
1. to escape, save, deliver, slip away
    1. (Qal) to escape
    2. (Piel)
      1. to bring into security, deliver
      2. to cause to escape, cast forth
      3. to be delivered
      4. to slip away
    3. (Hiphil) to bring into security, bring to safety
kjv_def: calve, carry away safe, deliver, (cause to) escape.
strongs_def: to slip out, i.e. escape; causatively, to deliver
